content.rendered:
• Custom chatbot tailored for your website
  • Trained using our proprietary software
  • Utilizes industry-leading AI infrastructure
  • Includes continuous maintenance to keep the chatbot updated
  • Maintenance ensures the chatbot adapts to changes you make
  • Post-maintenance fee period, ongoing services are $54.99/month
  • Affordable, ongoing support for consistent performance
  • Enhanced user experience with regular updates and improvements
